heading1: Engaged and activated diverse immigrant communities
body1: C&C partnered with the New Americans Campaign on a nationwide effort to connect with Legal Permanent Residents and guide qualified LPRs through the process of applying for U.S. citizenship. Effectively engaging these diverse communities required cultural sensitivity around tone, imagery, and language, which C&C achieved through rigorous ad testing and learning.

carousel.body: Our messenger chatbot was a popular tool that also helped verify that citizens were getting the info relevant to them, and that they had intentions to begin or get better about their recycling habits.

headline: Help immigrants become new American citizens
campaignDescription: The New Americans Campaign is a nationwide effort to inspire lawful permanent residents to take the first step toward U.S. citizenship. With communities awash in fear and misinformation, the campaignâ€™s success hinges not only upon informing a hard-to-reach population, but also in striking the right balance of tone, imagery, and language across diverse audiences. Through deep collaboration with on-the-ground stakeholders, coupled with an integrated, culturally-attuned media plan and rigorous testing, learning, and optimization, C&C pioneered an outreach model that effectively meets immigrant communities where they are and helps to deliver generational impact.
supportiveText: Developed a repeatable, scalable model for partner collaboration and long-term impact
